review: I cut off my cable to save some money and I went with the Amazon Fire TV and I love it! The voice search feature is awesome. My only problem is how the software is set up. A few more options would be great in how/what it searched through as far as separating Prime movies and those you may have to rent. But is very fast and easy to use. I love it! Wish I would have been able to get the discount with the 3 month subscription of SlingTv, but i've recommended this to several people and the ones that got it, have loved it too!

author: Don P.

review: I got this as a gift from a friend.I couldn't log in. I've used the exact same login and password as my amazon and it just refuses my login information.There's nothing online that addresses this issue. I've triple checked my email and password. It works to log into amazon.com but amazon TV reject it.------------------------------------------------------------------I contacted customer support via https://www.amazon.com/gp/help/contact-us/general-questions.html?skip=true#band after having them tell me to reset my password and it (obviously) not working, they transferred me to the tech department.From there they had me cycle the power and after the second time through, they reset the software.The software updated and they had me all registered. It was beautiful, but it did take me about 35 minutes on the tech line (that included having to wait for the software to update though)So, since the problem was resolved I'm giving 5 stars minus one for all the trouble.
